sections.heading: Exemption; limitation.The exemption granted under section 13-2027 shall not constitute a waiver of or exemption from the bidding provisions of sections 16-321 and 17-568
sections.text: 01 or any other similar provision.SourceLaws 1984, LB 911, ยง 4;R.S.1943, (1987), ยง 81-1574;Laws 1992, LB 1257, ยง 28.
